participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introverted, Alex enjoys spending time in her own world, often getting lost in her imagination.
participant_1.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jordan thrives on new experiences and loves sharing them with friends.
participant_2.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i do like watching cooking shows. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all.

content.text: when i graduate i want to be an engineer
